description: Unions representing workers at Turner Newall say they are 'disappointed' after talks with stricken parent firm Federal Mogul.
translated: Gewerkschaften, die die Arbeiter bei Turner Newall vertreten, sagen, sie sind 'enttäuscht' nach Gesprächen mit dem in Schwierigkeiten geratenen Mutterunternehmen Federal Mogul.

description: TORONTO, Canada A second team of rocketeers competing for the #36;10 million Ansari X Prize, a contest for privately funded suborbital space flight, has officially announced the first launch date for its manned rocket.
translated: TORONTO, Kanada Ein zweites Team von Raketenpiloten, das um den #36;10-Millionen-Ansari-X-Preis konkurriert, ein Wettbewerb für privat finanzierte suborbitale Raumflüge, hat offiziell das erste Startdatum für seine bemannte Rakete angekündigt.

description: A company founded by a chemistry researcher at the University of Louisville won a grant to develop a method of producing better peptides, which are short chains of amino acids, the building blocks of proteins.
translated: Une entreprise fondée par un chercheur en chimie de l'Université de Louisville a remporté une subvention pour développer une méthode de production de meilleurs peptides, qui sont de courtes chaînes d'acides aminés, les éléments constitutifs des protéines.

description: It's barely dawn when Mike Fitzpatrick starts his shift with a blur of colorful maps, figures, and endless charts, but already he knows what the day will bring. Lightning will strike in places he expects. Winds will pick up, moist places will dry and flames will roar.
translated: Mike Fitzpatrick commence sa journée à peine l'aube avec un tourbillon de cartes colorées, de chiffres et de graphiques sans fin, mais il sait déjà ce que la journée lui réserve. La foudre frappera là où il s'y attend. Les vents se lèveront, les endroits humides s'assécheront et les flammes rugiront.

description: Southern California's smog-fighting agency went after emissions of the bovine variety Friday, adopting the nation's first rules to reduce air pollution from dairy cow manure.
translated: Güney Kaliforniya'n?n dumanla mücadele eden kurumu, Cuma günü s???rlar?n türünden emisyonlara kar?? harekete geçti ve ülkenin ilk kurallar?n? benimseyerek süt inek gübresinden kaynaklanan hava kirlili?ini azaltt?.

description: The British Department for Education and Skills (DfES) recently launched a "Music Manifesto" campaign, with the ostensible intention of educating the next generation of British musicians. Unfortunately, they also teamed up with the music industry (EMI, and various artists) to make this popular. EMI has apparently negotiated their end well, so that children in our schools will now be indoctrinated about the illegality of downloading music. The ignorance and audacity of this got to me a little, so I wrote an open letter to the DfES about it. Unfortunately, it's pedantic, as I suppose you have to be when writing to government representatives. But I hope you find it useful, and perhaps feel inspired to do something similar, if or when the same thing has happened in your area.
translated: El Departamento Británico de Educación y Habilidades (DfES) lanzó recientemente una campaña de "Manifiesto Musical", con la aparente intención de educar a la próxima generación de músicos británicos. Desafortunadamente, también se asociaron con la industria musical (EMI y varios artistas) para hacer esto popular. EMI aparentemente negoció bien su fin, de modo que los niños en nuestras escuelas ahora serán adoctrinados sobre la ilegalidad de descargar música. La ignorancia y audacia de esto me molestó un poco, así que escribí una carta abierta al DfES al respecto. Desafortunadamente, es pedante, como supongo que debes ser al escribir a representantes del gobierno. Pero espero que te sea útil y tal vez te sientas inspirado a hacer algo similar, si es que ha sucedido lo mismo en tu área.

description: confessed author of the Netsky and Sasser viruses, is responsible for 70 percent of virus infections in 2004, according to a six-month virus roundup published Wednesday by antivirus company Sophos." "The 18-year-old Jaschan was taken into custody in Germany in May by police who said he had admitted programming both the Netsky and Sasser worms, something experts at Microsoft confirmed. (A Microsoft antivirus reward program led to the teenager's arrest.) During the five months preceding Jaschan's capture, there were at least 25 variants of Netsky and one of the port-scanning network worm Sasser." "Graham Cluley, senior technology consultant at Sophos, said it was staggeri ...
translated: Der geständige Autor der Netsky- und Sasser-Viren ist laut einem sechsmonatigen Virenrückblick, der am Mittwoch von der Antiviren-Firma Sophos veröffentlicht wurde, für 70 Prozent der Virusinfektionen im Jahr 2004 verantwortlich. Der 18-jährige Jaschan wurde im Mai in Deutschland von der Polizei in Gewahrsam genommen, die sagte, er habe zugegeben, sowohl die Netsky- als auch die Sasser-Würmer programmiert, etwas, was Experten bei Microsoft bestätigten. (Ein Belohnungsprogramm von Microsoft für Antivirensoftware führte zur Festnahme des Teenagers.) In den fünf Monaten vor Jaschans Festnahme gab es mindestens 25 Varianten von Netsky und einem der Port-Scanning-Netzwerkwürmer Sasser." "Graham Cluley, Senior Technology Consultant bei Sophos, sagte, es sei ...

description: \FOAF/LOAF and bloom filters have a lot of interesting properties for social\network and whitelist distribution.\I think we can go one level higher though and include GPG/OpenPGP key\fingerprint distribution in the FOAF file for simple web-of-trust based key\distribution.\What if we used FOAF and included the PGP key fingerprint(s) for identities?\This could mean a lot. You include the PGP key fingerprints within the FOAF\file of your direct friends and then include a bloom filter of the PGP key\fingerprints of your entire whitelist (the source FOAF file would of course need\to be encrypted ).\Your whitelist would be populated from the social network as your client\discovered new identit ...
translated: \FOAF/LOAF et les filtres bloom ont de nombreuses propriétés intéressantes pour la distribution de réseaux sociaux et de listes blanches. \Je pense cependant que nous pouvons aller encore plus loin et inclure la distribution de clés GPG/OpenPGP dans le fichier FOAF pour une distribution de clés basée sur la confiance du web. \Et si nous utilisions FOAF et incluions les empreintes digitales des clés PGP pour les identités ? \Cela pourrait signifier beaucoup. Vous incluez les empreintes digitales des clés PGP dans le fichier FOAF de vos amis directs, puis vous incluez un filtre bloom des empreintes digitales des clés PGP de l'ensemble de votre liste blanche (le fichier FOAF source devrait bien sûr être crypté). \Votre liste blanche serait peuplée à partir du réseau social à mesure que votre client découvre de nouvelles identités ...

description: Wiltshire Police warns about "phishing" after its fraud squad chief was targeted.
translated: Wiltshire Polisi, doland?r?c?l?k ekibi ?efi hedef al?nd?ktan sonra "phishing" hakk?nda uyar?yor.

description: In its first two years, the UK's dedicated card fraud unit, has recovered 36,000 stolen cards and 171 arrests - and estimates it saved 65m.
translated: ?lk iki y?l?nda, ?ngiltere'nin özel kart doland?r?c?l??? birimi, 36.000 çal?nm?? kart? ve 171 tutuklamay? kurtard? - ve 65 milyon pound tasarruf etti?i tahmin ediliyor.

description: A group of technology companies including Texas Instruments Inc. <TXN.N>, STMicroelectronics <STM.PA> and Broadcom Corp. <BRCM.O>, on Thursday said they will propose a new wireless networking standard up to 10 times the speed of the current generation.
translated: Bir grup teknoloji ?irketi, Texas Instruments Inc. <TXN.N>, STMicroelectronics <STM.PA> ve Broadcom Corp. <BRCM.O> dahil olmak üzere, Per?embe günü mevcut neslin h?z?n?n 10 kat?na kadar yeni bir kablosuz a? standard? önerdiklerini söyledi.

description: Apple Computer Inc.<AAPL.O> on Tuesday began shipping a new program designed to let users create real-time motion graphics and unveiled a discount video editing software bundle featuring its flagship Final Cut Pro software.
translated: Apple Computer Inc.<AAPL.O> a commencé à expédier mardi un nouveau programme conçu pour permettre aux utilisateurs de créer des graphiques en mouvement en temps réel et a dévoilé un ensemble de logiciels de montage vidéo à prix réduit mettant en vedette son logiciel phare Final Cut Pro.

description: Free Record Shop, a Dutch music retail chain, beat Apple Computer Inc. to market on Tuesday with the launch of a new download service in Europe's latest battleground for digital song services.
translated: Free Record Shop, una cadena minorista de música holandesa, venció a Apple Computer Inc. en el mercado el martes con el lanzamiento de un nuevo servicio de descarga en el último campo de batalla de Europa para los servicios de canciones digitales.

description: A giant 100km colony of ants which has been discovered in Melbourne, Australia, could threaten local insect species.
translated: Un gigantesco colonia de hormigas de 100 km que ha sido descubierta en Melbourne, Australia, podría amenazar a las especies locales de insectos.

description: Dolphin groups, or "pods," rely on socialites to keep them from collapsing, scientists claim.
translated: Les groupes de dauphins, ou "pods", comptent sur les mondains pour les empêcher de s'effondrer, affirment les scientifiques.

description: Tyrannosaurus rex achieved its massive size due to an enormous growth spurt during its adolescent years.
translated: Le Tyrannosaurus rex a atteint sa taille massive en raison d'une énorme poussée de croissance pendant ses années d'adolescence.

description: Scientists have discovered irregular lumps beneath the icy surface of Jupiter's largest moon, Ganymede. These irregular masses may be rock formations, supported by Ganymede's icy shell for billions of years...
translated: Les scientifiques ont découvert des bosses irrégulières sous la surface glacée de la plus grande lune de Jupiter, Ganymède. Ces masses irrégulières pourraient être des formations rocheuses, soutenues par la coquille glacée de Ganymède depuis des milliards d'années...

description: ESAs Mars Express has relayed pictures from one of NASA's Mars rovers for the first time, as part of a set of interplanetary networking demonstrations. The demonstrations pave the way for future Mars missions to draw on joint interplanetary networking capabilities...
translated: La Mars Express de l'ESA a relayé des images d'un des rovers de Mars de la NASA pour la première fois, dans le cadre d'une série de démonstrations de réseautage interplanétaire. Les démonstrations ouvrent la voie aux futures missions martiennes pour tirer parti des capacités de réseautage interplanétaire conjoint...

description: When did life begin? One evidential clue stems from the fossil records in Western Australia, although whether these layered sediments are biological or chemical has spawned a spirited debate. Oxford researcher, Nicola McLoughlin, describes some of the issues in contention.
translated: Quand la vie a-t-elle commencé ? Un indice probant provient des fossiles dans l'ouest de l'Australie, bien que la question de savoir si ces sédiments stratifiés sont biologiques ou chimiques a suscité un débat animé. La chercheuse d'Oxford, Nicola McLoughlin, décrit certaines des questions en débat.

description: Update Earnings per share rise compared with a year ago, but company misses analysts' expectations by a long shot.
translated: Mise à jour Les bénéfices par action augmentent par rapport à l'année dernière, mais la société manque largement les attentes des analystes.

description: By the end of the year, the computing giant plans to have its biggest headcount since 1991.
translated: D'ici la fin de l'année, le géant de l'informatique prévoit d'avoir son effectif le plus important depuis 1991.

description: Developers get early code for new operating system 'skin' still being crafted.
translated: Les développeurs obtiennent un code préliminaire pour la nouvelle "peau" du système d'exploitation en cours de création.

description: New technology applies electrical fuses to help identify and repair faults.
translated: La nouvelle technologie applique des fusibles électriques pour aider à identifier et à réparer les défauts.

description: Google has billed its IPO as a way for everyday people to get in on the process, denying Wall Street the usual stranglehold it's had on IPOs. Public bidding, a minimum of just five shares, an open process with 28 underwriters - all this pointed to a new level of public participation. But this isn't the case.
translated: Google a facturé son introduction en bourse comme un moyen pour les gens ordinaires de participer au processus, refusant à Wall Street l'emprise habituelle qu'elle a eue sur les introductions en bourse. Les enchères publiques, un minimum de seulement cinq actions, un processus ouvert avec 28 preneurs fermes - tout cela pointait vers un nouveau niveau de participation du public. Mais ce n'est pas le cas.

description: Charly Travers offers advice on withstanding the volatility of the biotech sector.
translated: Charly Travers gibt Ratschläge, wie man der Volatilität des Biotech-Sektors standhalten kann.

description: Web giant Yahoo! is gambling that price cuts on its domain name registration and Web hosting products will make it more competitive with discounters in the space -- which means that small businesses looking to move online get a sweeter deal through ...
translated: Der Web-Gigant Yahoo! setzt darauf, dass Preissenkungen bei der Registrierung von Domainnamen und Web-Hosting-Produkten es wettbewerbsfähiger machen werden im Vergleich zu Discount-Anbietern in diesem Bereich - was bedeutet, dass kleine Unternehmen, die online gehen möchten, ein besseres Angebot erhalten ...

description: Mills Corp. agreed to purchase a 50 percent interest in nine malls owned by General Motors Asset Management Corp. for just over $1 billion, creating a new joint venture between the groups. The deal will extend ...
translated: Mills Corp. hat sich darauf geeinigt, eine 50-prozentige Beteiligung an neun Einkaufszentren zu erwerben, die im Besitz von General Motors Asset Management Corp. sind, für etwas mehr als 1 Milliarde US-Dollar. Dabei entsteht ein neues Joint Venture zwischen den Gruppen. Die Transaktion wird erweitert ...

description: The newly released traffic crash fatality data have something for everyone in the debate about the safety of sport utility vehicles.
translated: Die kürzlich veröffentlichten Daten zur Verkehrsunfallsterblichkeit haben für jeden etwas in der Debatte über die Sicherheit von Sportgeländefahrzeugen.

description: The dollar moved in tight ranges on Wednesday as most investors shrugged off lower than expected U.S. inflation data and stuck to the view the U.S. Federal Reserve would continue raising rates.
translated: Der Dollar bewegte sich am Mittwoch in engen Spannen, da die meisten Anleger die niedriger als erwarteten Daten zur US-Inflation ignorierten und die Ansicht beibehielten, dass die US Federal Reserve die Zinssätze weiter erhöhen würde.

description: Oil prices surged to a new high of $47 a barrel on Wednesday after a new threat by rebel militia against Iraqi oil facilities and as the United States said inflation had stayed in check despite rising energy costs.
translated: Los precios del petróleo se dispararon a un nuevo máximo de $47 por barril el miércoles después de una nueva amenaza de milicias rebeldes contra las instalaciones petroleras iraquíes y mientras Estados Unidos dijo que la inflación se mantuvo bajo control a pesar del aumento de los costos de la energía.

description: The Securities and Exchange Commission is expected to vote Wednesday to prohibit mutual fund companies from funneling stock trades to brokerage firms that agree to promote their funds to investors.
translated: Se espera que la Comisión de Valores y Bolsa vote el miércoles para prohibir a las compañías de fondos mutuos canalizar las operaciones de acciones a firmas de corretaje que acepten promocionar sus fondos entre los inversores.

description: China Mobile (Hong Kong) Ltd. (CHL), the listed unit of China #39;s biggest cellular phone operator, posted Wednesday a 7.8 rise in first half net profit on a 23 increase in its subscriber base.
translated: China Mobile (Hong Kong) Ltd. (CHL), la unidad cotizada del mayor operador de telefonía celular de China, registró el miércoles un aumento del 7.8 en las ganancias netas del primer semestre gracias a un aumento del 23 en su base de suscriptores.

description: Monsanto Co. MON.N on Wednesday said the U.S. Justice Department has closed an inquiry into potential antitrust issues regarding a key ingredient used in its Roundup herbicide.
translated: Monsanto Co. MON.N anunció el miércoles que el Departamento de Justicia de Estados Unidos cerró una investigación sobre posibles problemas antimonopolio relacionados con un ingrediente clave utilizado en su herbicida Roundup.

description: Cox Communications Inc. #39;s board of directors has formed a special committee of independent directors to consider Cox Enterprises Inc. #39;s proposal to take the company private in a $8 billion stock buyout.
translated: La junta directiva de Cox Communications Inc. #39; ha formado un comité especial de directores independientes para considerar la propuesta de Cox Enterprises Inc. #39; de privatizar la compañía en una compra de acciones de $8 mil millones.

description: U.S. airlines have agreed to limit flights into Chicago's O'Hare International Airport to 88 arrivals per hour between 7 a.m. and 8 p.m. in an effort to cut congestion that has slowed the whole U.S. aviation system, federal officials said on Wednesday.

description: Medtronic Inc. MDT.N on Wednesday said its quarterly earnings rose on brisk demand for devices that manage irregular heart beats and products used to treat the spine.

description: Health care and consumer products maker Johnson amp; Johnson (JNJ.N: Quote, Profile, Research) is in negotiations to acquire medical-device maker Guidant Corp.
translated: Sa?l?k bak?m? ve tüketici ürünleri üreticisi Johnson amp; Johnson (JNJ.N: Al?nt?, Profil, Ara?t?rma), t?bbi cihaz üreticisi Guidant Corp'yu sat?n almak için görü?melere devam ediyor.

description: A closely watched measure of future economic activity fell in July for the second consecutive month, reinforcing evidence that the nation's financial recovery is slackening.
Colgate Palmolive Co. CL.N will cut about 4,400 jobs, or 12 percent of its work force, and close nearly a third of its factories under a restructuring, the consumer products company said on Tuesday.
Ohio authorities sued Best Buy Co. Inc. on Thursday, alleging the electronics retailer engaged in unfair and deceptive business practices.

China is interested in participating in the bidding for Yuganskneftegaz, the top oil-producing subsidiary of the Russian oil giant Yukos, a Chinese economic official was quoted as saying in a report Thursday by the Russian news agency Interfax. The ...
Attorney General Jim Petro is suing Best Buy, alleging the electronics retailer has engaged in unfair and deceptive business practices.
Southwest Airlines Inc. (LUV.N), the largest U.S. discount carrier, on Monday said it will eliminate 88 scheduled flights in order to boost revenue by freeing up planes for more lucrative markets.
translated: Southwest Airlines Inc. (LUV.N), la plus grande compagnie aérienne à bas coûts des États-Unis, a annoncé lundi qu'elle supprimerait 88 vols programmés afin d'augmenter ses revenus en libérant des avions pour des marchés plus lucratifs.

description: A business columnist has resigned from the Seattle Times after admitting he plagiarized the work of other journalists, said the newspaper.
translated: Un chroniqueur d'affaires a démissionné du Seattle Times après avoir admis avoir plagié le travail d'autres journalistes, a annoncé le journal.

description: British students spend about \$1.8 billion on drink every year, nearly three times as much as they cough up for books, a survey released on Monday showed.
translated: Les étudiants britanniques dépensent environ 1,8 milliard de dollars par an en boisson, soit près de trois fois plus que ce qu'ils dépensent pour les livres, a révélé une enquête publiée lundi.

description: Undergraduates in the city earn more than 90 a week on average, just behind Glasgow, Cambridge and Cardiff. Their hard-earned cash is likely to be spent on looking good and socialising, the
translated: Les étudiants de premier cycle en ville gagnent en moyenne plus de 90 livres par semaine, juste derrière Glasgow, Cambridge et Cardiff. Leur argent durement gagné est susceptible d'être dépensé pour avoir l'air bien et socialiser, le

description: Defense contractor Northrop Grumman Corp. on Monday said it received a 10-year, \$408 million Army contract to provide simulated battle command training support to Army corps commanders - the latest award in the
translated: Le contractant de la défense Northrop Grumman Corp. a déclaré lundi qu'il avait reçu un contrat de 10 ans de l'armée d'une valeur de 408 millions de dollars pour fournir un soutien à la formation de commandement de bataille simulé aux commandants de corps de l'armée - la dernière récompense dans la

description: The man who claims Gov. James E. McGreevey sexually harassed him was pushing for a cash settlement of up to #36;50 million before the governor decided to announce that he was gay and had an extramarital affair, sources told The Associated Press.
translated: L'homme qui prétendait que le gouverneur James E. McGreevey l'avait harcelé sexuellement poussait pour un règlement financier allant jusqu'à 50 millions de dollars avant que le gouverneur ne décide d'annoncer qu'il était gay et avait eu une liaison extraconjugale, ont déclaré des sources à l'Associated Press.

description: Explosions and gunfire rattled through the city of Najaf as U.S. troops in armored vehicles and tanks rolled back into the streets here Sunday, a day after the collapse of talks and with them a temporary cease fire intended to end the fighting in this holy city...
translated: Des explosions et des coups de feu ont secoué la ville de Najaf alors que les troupes américaines dans des véhicules blindés et des chars revenaient dans les rues dimanche, un jour après l'effondrement des pourparlers et avec eux un cessez-le-feu temporaire destiné à mettre fin aux combats dans cette ville sainte...

description: A frail Pope John Paul II, breathing heavily and gasping at times, celebrated an open air Mass on Sunday for several hundred thousand pilgrims, many in wheelchairs, at a shrine to the Virgin Mary that is associated with miraculous cures. At one point he said "help me" in Polish while struggling through his homily in French...
translated: Un Pape Jean-Paul II affaibli, respirant lourdement et haletant par moments, a célébré une messe en plein air dimanche devant plusieurs centaines de milliers de pèlerins, dont beaucoup étaient en fauteuil roulant, dans un sanctuaire dédié à la Vierge Marie, associé à des guérisons miraculeuses. À un moment donné, il a dit 'aidez-moi' en polonais en luttant à travers son homélie en français...

description: VANCOUVER (CP) The sister of a man who died after a violent confrontation with police has demanded the city's chief constable resign for defending the officer involved.
translated: VANCOUVER (CP) La sœur d'un homme décédé après une violente confrontation avec la police a exigé la démission du chef de la police de la ville pour avoir défendu l'officier impliqué.

description: Supporters and rivals warn of possible fraud; government says Chavez's defeat could produce turmoil in world oil market.
translated: Les partisans et les rivaux mettent en garde contre une possible fraude ; le gouvernement dit que la défaite de Chavez pourrait provoquer des turbulences sur le marché mondial du pétrole.

description: Fans of Michael Jackson erupted in cheers Monday as the pop star emerged from a double-decker tour bus and went into court for a showdown with the prosecutor who has pursued him for years on child molestation charges...
translated: Fans von Michael Jackson brachen am Montag in Jubel aus, als der Popstar aus einem Doppeldecker-Tourbus auftauchte und vor Gericht ging, um sich mit dem Staatsanwalt zu stellen, der ihn jahrelang wegen Kindesmissbrauch verfolgt hat...

description: LANGLEY, B.C. (CP) Police have arrested a man in the kidnapping and sexual assault of an 11-year-old girl that frightened this suburban Vancouver community last week.
translated: LANGLEY, B.C. (CP) Die Polizei hat einen Mann wegen der Entführung und sexuellen Übergriffe an einem 11-jährigen Mädchen festgenommen, das letzte Woche diese Vorstadtgemeinde von Vancouver erschreckte.

description: An industrial city northwest of Moscow struggles as AIDS hits a broader population.
translated: Eine Industriestadt nordwestlich von Moskau kämpft, da AIDS eine breitere Bevölkerung betrifft.

description: China has said no date has been set for working level talks on the North Korean nuclear crisis and gave no indication that the meeting has been canceled, Australian Foreign Minister Alexander Downer said on Tuesday.
translated: China hat erklärt, dass kein Termin für Gespräche auf Arbeitsebene zur nordkoreanischen Atomkrise festgelegt wurde und keine Anzeichen dafür vorliegen, dass das Treffen abgesagt wurde, sagte der australische Außenminister Alexander Downer am Dienstag.

description: The last surviving American defector to communist North Korea wants to tell his story to put a human face on the Stalinist state which he believes is unfairly vilified abroad, British filmmakers said.
translated: Der letzte überlebende amerikanische Überläufer nach kommunistischem Nordkorea möchte seine Geschichte erzählen, um dem stalinistischen Staat, der seiner Meinung nach im Ausland unfair verleumdet wird, ein menschliches Gesicht zu verleihen, sagten britische Filmemacher.

description: Former chess champion Bobby Fischer's announcement that he is engaged to a Japanese woman could win him sympathy among Japanese officials and help him avoid deportation to the United States, his fiancee and one of his supporters said Tuesday.

Pieter van den Hoogenband of the Netherlands and Australian Ian Thorpe advanced to the evening semifinal a day after dueling teenager Michael Phelps in the 200 freestyle, won by Thorpe...

description: Just what Alexander Downer was thinking when he declared on radio last Friday that "they could fire a missile from North Korea to Sydney" is unclear. The provocative remark, just days before his arrival yesterday on his second visit to the North Korean ...
translated: Alexander Downer'?n geçen Cuma günü radyoda "Kuzey Kore'den Sydney'e bir füze ate?leyebilirlerdi" dedi?inde ne dü?ündü?ü belirsiz. Kuzey Kore'ye ikinci ziyaretine geldi?i dünün birkaç gün öncesinde yap?lan provokatif aç?klama...

description: LONDON, AUGUST 17: Britain charged eight terror suspects on Tuesday with conspiracy to commit murder and said one had plans that could be used in striking US buildings that were the focus of security scares this month.
translated: LONDRES, 17 DE AGOSTO: Gran Bretaña acusó a ocho sospechosos de terror el martes de conspiración para cometer asesinato y dijo que uno tenía planes que podrían usarse para atacar edificios estadounidenses que fueron el foco de las alertas de seguridad este mes.

description: A national political conference's bid to end the fighting in the Shiite Muslim holy city of Najaf appeared to have failed Tuesday.
translated: El intento de una conferencia política nacional de poner fin a los combates en la sagrada ciudad musulmana chiíta de Najaf parecía haber fracasado el martes.

description: TBILISI, Georgia Georgian President Mikhail Saakashvili appealed to world leaders Tuesday to convene an international conference on the conflict in breakaway South Ossetia, where daily exchanges of gunfire threaten to spark ...
translated: TBILISI, Georgia. El presidente georgiano, Mikhail Saakashvili, hizo un llamado a los líderes mundiales el martes para convocar una conferencia internacional sobre el conflicto en la región separatista de Osetia del Sur, donde los intercambios diarios de disparos amenazan con desencadenar...

description: Georgian and South Ossetian forces overnight accused each other of trying to storm the other side's positions in Georgia's breakaway region of South Ossetia, as four Georgian soldiers were reported to be wounded.
translated: Las fuerzas georgianas y ossetias del sur se acusaron mutuamente durante la noche de intentar asaltar las posiciones del otro en la región separatista de Osetia del Sur de Georgia, mientras se informaba que cuatro soldados georgianos resultaron heridos.

description: John Kerry, Bob Kerrey. It's easy to get confused.
translated: John Kerry, Bob Kerrey. Es fácil confundirse.

description: Michael Phelps won the gold medal in the 400 individual medley and set a world record in a time of 4 minutes 8.26 seconds.
translated: Michael Phelps ganó la medalla de oro en la prueba de 400 metros estilos individuales y estableció un récord mundial con un tiempo de 4 minutos y 8.26 segundos.

description: Looking at his ridiculously developed upper body, with huge biceps and hardly an ounce of fat, it's easy to see why Ty Law, arguably the best cornerback in football, chooses physical play over finesse. That's not to imply that he's lacking a finesse component, because he can shut down his side of the field much as Deion Sanders ...
translated: Al observar su cuerpo superior ridículamente desarrollado, con enormes bíceps y apenas una onza de grasa, es fácil ver por qué Ty Law, posiblemente el mejor esquinero del fútbol, elige el juego físico sobre la destreza. Esto no implica que le falte una componente de destreza, porque puede cerrar su lado del campo tanto como Deion Sanders...

description: With the weeks dwindling until Jason Varitek enters free agency, the Red Sox continue to carefully monitor Kelly Shoppach, their catcher of the future, in his climb toward the majors. The Sox like most of what they have seen at Triple-A Pawtucket from Shoppach, though it remains highly uncertain whether he can make the adjustments at the plate ...
translated: Con las semanas disminuyendo hasta que Jason Varitek entre en la agencia libre, los Medias Rojas continúan monitoreando cuidadosamente a Kelly Shoppach, su receptor del futuro, en su ascenso hacia las Grandes Ligas. Los Medias Rojas están satisfechos con la mayor parte de lo que han visto en Triple-A Pawtucket de Shoppach, aunque sigue siendo altamente incierto si puede hacer los ajustes en el plato...

description: Just imagine what David Ortiz could do on a good night's rest. Ortiz spent the night before last with his baby boy, D'Angelo, who is barely 1 month old. He had planned on attending the Red Sox' Family Day at Fenway Park yesterday morning, but he had to sleep in. After all, Ortiz had a son at home, and he ...
translated: Solo imagina lo que David Ortiz podría hacer con una buena noche de descanso. Ortiz pasó la noche antes de anoche con su bebé, D'Angelo, que tiene apenas 1 mes de edad. Tenía planeado asistir al Día de la Familia de los Medias Rojas en el Fenway Park ayer por la mañana, pero tuvo que quedarse a dormir. Después de todo, Ortiz tenía un hijo en casa y...

description: In "helping themselves," Ricky Bryant, Chas Gessner, Michael Jennings, and David Patten did nothing Friday night to make Bill Belichick's decision on what to do with his receivers any easier.
translated: En "ayudarse a sí mismos", Ricky Bryant, Chas Gessner, Michael Jennings y David Patten no hicieron nada el viernes por la noche para facilitar la decisión de Bill Belichick sobre qué hacer con sus receptores.

description: Randy Johnson struck out 14 batters in 8 1/3 innings to help the Arizona Diamondbacks end a nine-game losing streak with a 2-0 win over the host New York Mets in the National League Sunday.
translated: Randy Johnson schlug 14 Schlagmänner in 8 1/3 Innings, um den Arizona Diamondbacks zu helfen, eine neun Spiele andauernde Verlustserie mit einem 2:0-Sieg gegen die Gastgeber New York Mets in der National League am Sonntag zu beenden.

description: U.S. Ryder Cup captain Hal Sutton finalized his team on Monday when he announced the selections of Jay Haas and Stewart Cink as his captain's picks.
translated: Der US-Ryder-Cup-Kapitän Hal Sutton finalisierte sein Team am Montag, als er die Auswahl von Jay Haas und Stewart Cink als seine Kapitänsauswahl bekannt gab.

description: Jay Haas joined Stewart Cink as the two captain's picks for a U.S. team that will try to regain the cup from Europe next month.
translated: Jay Haas schloss sich Stewart Cink als den beiden Kapitänsauswahlen für ein US-Team an, das nächsten Monat versuchen wird, den Cup von Europa zurückzuerobern.

description: American Natalie Coughlin won Olympic gold in the 100 meter backstroke Monday night. Coughlin, the only woman ever to swim under 1 minute in the event, finished first in 1 minute, 0.37 seconds. Kirsty Coventry of Zimbabwe, who swims at Auburn University in Alabama, earned the silver in 1:00.50. Laure Manaudou of France took bronze in 1:00.88.
translated: Die Amerikanerin Natalie Coughlin gewann am Montagabend Olympisches Gold über 100 Meter Rückenschwimmen. Coughlin, die einzige Frau, die jemals unter 1 Minute in dieser Disziplin geschwommen ist, belegte den ersten Platz in 1 Minute, 0,37 Sekunden. Kirsty Coventry aus Simbabwe, die an der Auburn University in Alabama schwimmt, holte sich die Silbermedaille in 1:00,50. Laure Manaudou aus Frankreich gewann Bronze in 1:00,88.

description: The Charlotte Bobcats traded center Predrag Drobnjak to the Atlanta Hawks on Monday for a second-round pick in the 2005 NBA draft.
translated: Die Charlotte Bobcats tauschten Center Predrag Drobnjak am Montag gegen die Atlanta Hawks gegen eine zweite Wahl in der NBA-Draft 2005.

description: England coach Sven Goran Eriksson said Tuesday he isn't under any extra pressure in the aftermath of a scandal that damaged the Football Association's reputation.
translated: L'entraîneur de l'Angleterre, Sven Goran Eriksson, a déclaré mardi qu'il n'est pas sous une pression supplémentaire à la suite d'un scandale qui a terni la réputation de la Football Association.

description: Striker Emile Heskey has pulled out of the England squad ahead of Wednesday's friendly against Ukraine because of a tight hamstring, the Football Association said Tuesday.
translated: L'attaquant Emile Heskey s'est retiré de l'équipe d'Angleterre avant le match amical de mercredi contre l'Ukraine en raison d'une élongation musculaire, a annoncé la Football Association mardi.

description: An Indian army major shot his way to his country's first-ever individual Olympic silver medal on Tuesday, while in the same event a member of Dubai's ruling family became the first-ever medallist from the United Arab Emirates.
translated: Un major de l'armée indienne a remporté mardi la première médaille d'argent individuelle olympique de son pays, tandis que lors du même événement, un membre de la famille régnante de Dubaï est devenu le premier médaillé des Émirats arabes unis.

description: World 100 meters champion Torri Edwards will miss the Athens Olympics after her appeal against a two-year drugs ban was dismissed on Tuesday, a source told Reuters.
translated: La championne du monde du 100 mètres, Torri Edwards, manquera les Jeux olympiques d'Athènes après que son appel contre une suspension de deux ans pour dopage a été rejeté mardi, a déclaré une source à Reuters.

description: Ilias Iliadis of Greece thrilled the home crowd Tuesday, beating Roman Gontyuk of Ukraine to win the gold medal in the 81-kilogram class.
translated: Ilias Iliadis de la Grèce a enthousiasmé la foule locale mardi en battant Roman Gontyuk de l'Ukraine pour remporter la médaille d'or dans la catégorie des 81 kilogrammes.

description: The United States men's basketball team capped off a big day for the USA by fighting off Greece for a vital win, 77-71. "They played with heart," said Coach Larry Brown. "That's all you can ask."
translated: ABD erkek basketbol tak?m?, 77-71'lik önemli bir galibiyet için Yunanistan'a kar?? sava?arak ABD için büyük bir günü tamamlad?. "Kalpleriyle oynad?lar," dedi Koç Larry Brown. "Daha fazla ne isteyebilirsiniz."

description: It was another busy day on the medical front for the Red Sox, as a series of roster moves were announced prior to Tuesday night's game against the Blue Jays.

description: William H. Harlan, the retired University of Florida swimming coach who led the Gators to eight conference titles, died Tuesday, school officials said. He was 83.
translated: Üniversite yetkililerine göre, Florida Üniversitesi'nde emekli olan ve Gators'? sekiz konferans ?ampiyonlu?una götüren yüzme koçu William H. Harlan Sal? günü hayat?n? kaybetti. 83 ya??ndayd?.

description: So Michael Phelps is not going to match the seven gold medals won by Mark Spitz. And it is too early to tell if he will match Aleksandr Dityatin, the Soviet gymnast who won eight total medals in 1980. But those were not the ...

description: Orlando Cabrera hit a run-scoring double off the Green Monster in the ninth inning on reliever Justin Speier's second pitch of the game, giving the Boston Red Sox a 5-4 win over the Toronto Blue Jays on Tuesday night.
translated: Orlando Cabrera, oyunda röva?atac? Justin Speier'?n ikinci at???nda Green Monster'dan iki ko?u kazand?ran bir çift vuru? yapt? ve Boston Red Sox'a Sal? gecesi Toronto Blue Jays kar??s?nda 5-4'lük bir galibiyet kazand?rd?.
